I tried reshuffling various modules (Lazor control systems in place of ASAS, avionics package) but that seemed to only make it worse ( it now shakes itself apart when I try to pull up). Could someone guide me on how to fix this craft.

craft in question:

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/showthread.php/37072-The-Ravenspear-Mk-V-SSTO
